property.name: url
property.label: SOCi Base URL
property.description: Specifies the base address of the SOCi Platform to embed in the iframe.

property.name: accountid
property.label: SOCi Account ID
property.description: Specifies the account of the SOCi Platform to embed in the iframe.

property.name: productlink
property.label: SOCi Product link
property.description: Specifies the link to the functionality you want to include in the iframe.

property.name: header
property.label: SOCi Header
property.description: Specifies the name of the component you want to include in the iframe.

property.name: apikey
property.label: API Key
property.description: Specifies the api key of of your SOCi.

property.name: height
property.label: Height
property.description: Specifies the height of the iframe. Default height is 500 pixels.

property.name: width
property.label: Width
property.description: Specifies the width of an iframe. Default width is 100 percent.

property.name: sandbox
property.label: Sandbox
property.description: Enables an extra set of restrictions for the content in an iframe.
